Turn off lights when you leave a room.
Carry a reusable bottle instead of single-use plastic.
Unplug chargers when not in use to save energy.
Use a clothesline instead of a dryer when you can.
Switch to LED bulbs — they use much less electricity.
Fix leaking taps — one drip wastes lots of water.
Buy second-hand or borrow instead of buying new.
Compost kitchen scraps to reduce waste and enrich soil.
